name: Wannabe Blue
description:
This is my second game in Unreal Engine. It is rather short and simple in gameplay, but I enjoyed working on new things such as UI and music.

You're a purple experimental slime within a facility have escaped your chamber to become blue. However, you must first pass the security guards that block your way.

Controls:

AWSD/ Left-stick: Move around

Arrow Keys/ Right-Stick: Move Camera

P: Pause

*Note*: controller support for UI options haven't been added, so you will have to use a mouse

*Also Note*: all textures are 64x64 or lower!
